## Monday, August 12, 2024

### Tip of the Day - Part Two

[![](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEijB3xmNegN2VgL1tJFNilNy7mLlmj2J3z-oatABNSzhhgPYhqkqi_Y5KsaXSwCCCx9lKuix-gnIk8KYwC_YBcN9KpAsSMLTcihItmFoRYrnJhp3UOrxo3vf5Y9KhNUQAfwguF1msz8ODNfMPpTPLSNbHcuq4ZSqxoULnSVA5DmKzhUe0sWDFOi/s320/Misc_9600.png)](https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEijB3xmNegN2VgL1tJFNilNy7mLlmj2J3z-oatABNSzhhgPYhqkqi_Y5KsaXSwCCCx9lKuix-gnIk8KYwC_YBcN9KpAsSMLTcihItmFoRYrnJhp3UOrxo3vf5Y9KhNUQAfwguF1msz8ODNfMPpTPLSNbHcuq4ZSqxoULnSVA5DmKzhUe0sWDFOi/s500/Misc_9600.png)

This is the second tip of the day where I'll do my best to use Technical Collection and offer a peek inside a pretty in-depth and comprehensive list of 138 ransomware-themed Tox IDs for research and analysis and attribution purposes.

**Here's the complete list of ransowmare-themed Tox IDs:**
